name: Letter or Number length
description: Any letter in CAP or small plus any Digit to the length of 17 characters
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.

Sample text for testing:
thisis17character
this is not working because it have spaces
onlyworkswithoutspaces to the 17 character
further examples
abcdefghijklmnopq 
ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQ
154825258985jh55j885
12345678910111213
author: Scott main
